EmailTemplate.description: Used by the Big Deal Alert workflow rule, which runs when a deal closes with an amount greater than $100,000.
EmailTemplate.name: Big Deal Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Organization.Name} does it again !!!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations all!
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} has just closed {!Account.Name}, for {!Opportunity.Amount}.
Please email {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName} to congratulate them !
